StepParameter.Name: ajaxsearch
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM wanba_youxi WHERE name LIKE '弹弹堂Ⅱ'

StepParameter.Name: ajaxsearch
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM wanba_youxi WHERE name LIKE ''

StepParameter.Name: ajaxsearch
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM wanba_youxi WHERE name LIKE '游仙'

StepParameter.Name: ajaxrecommend
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM youxi_user_rec_all_data ORDER BY `youxi_user_rec_all_data`.`id` DESC

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT serverName FROM `youxi_server_info` WHERE (`gameId` =870 AND (`status` =20 OR `status` =10 OR `status` =30)) ORDER BY `youxi_server_info`.`effectTime` DESC

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: select serverName from youxi_server_info where (youxi_server_info.gameId in (150 , 177 , 202 , 201 , 274 , 137 , 240 , 242 , 131 , 220 , 108 , 107 , 251 , 269 , 209 , 271 , 135 , 118 , 186 , 191)) and plat='1' and (youxi_server_info.status between 10 and 30) order by youxi_server_info.effectTime desc

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT gameId, serverName FROM youxi_server_info WHERE (plat = '1' AND effectTime LIKE ('select curdate();+%') AND (status between 10 and 40)) ORDER BY effectTime DESC

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT gameId, serverName FROM youxi_server_info WHERE (plat = '1' AND effectTime between ('select curdate();') and ('select date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day);')) AND status between 10 and 40 ORDER BY effectTime DESC

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: select serverName from youxi_server_info where gameId=870 and status < 50 and status>1 and plat='1' order by effectTime desc

StepParameter.Name: serverlistnotlogin
StepParameter.CommandText: select serverName from youxi_server_info where gameId=478 and status < 50 and status>1 and plat='1' order by effectTime desc limit 3

StepParameter.Name: serverselect
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT `serverName` FROM `youxi_server_info` WHERE `gameId` =870 AND `plat` LIKE '1' ORDER BY `youxi_server_info`.`effectTime` DESC

StepParameter.Name: ajaxyouxi
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT distinct youxi_info.name FROM `youxi_info`, wanba_youxi WHERE (wanba_youxi.id=youxi_info.id AND `wanba_youxi`.`category`=10 AND status=50) order by youxi_info.baseScore desc,youxi_info.scoreWeight desc, youxi_info.id desc

StepParameter.Name: ajaxyouxi
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT distinct youxi_info.name FROM `youxi_info`, wanba_youxi WHERE (wanba_youxi.id=youxi_info.id AND `wanba_youxi`.`category`=40 AND status=50) order by youxi_info.baseScore desc,youxi_info.scoreWeight desc, youxi_info.id desc

StepParameter.Name: ajaxyouxi
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT distinct youxi_info.name FROM `youxi_info`, wanba_youxi WHERE (wanba_youxi.id=youxi_info.id AND `wanba_youxi`.`category`=20 AND status=50) order by youxi_info.baseScore desc,youxi_info.scoreWeight desc, youxi_info.id desc

StepParameter.Name: ajaxyouxi
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT distinct youxi_info.name FROM `youxi_info`, wanba_youxi WHERE (wanba_youxi.id=youxi_info.id AND `wanba_youxi`.`category`=30 AND status=50) order by youxi_info.baseScore desc,youxi_info.scoreWeight desc, youxi_info.id desc

StepParameter.Name: ajaxyouxi
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT distinct youxi_info.name FROM `youxi_info`, wanba_youxi WHERE (wanba_youxi.id=youxi_info.id AND `wanba_youxi`.`category`=148 AND status=50) order by youxi_info.baseScore desc,youxi_info.scoreWeight desc, youxi_info.id desc

StepParameter.Name: gameannounce
StepParameter.CommandText: select message,url from wanba_announce_game where type=1 and startTime<='select now();' and endTime>='select now();' order by startTime desc
